mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_cate(cateno, title, seqno, visible, rdate, cnt) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(cateno), 0) + 1 as cateno FROM notice_cate), #{title}, #{seqno}, #{visible}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT cateno, title, seqno, visible, TO_CHAR(rdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mi:ss') as rdate, cnt FROM notice_cate ORDER BY seqno ASC
